front.title: Multipath Extension for the Optimized Link State Routing Protocol version 2 (OLSRv2)

abstract.t: This document specifies a multipath extension for the Optimized Link State Routing Protocol version 2 (OLSRv2) to discover multiple disjoint paths, so as to improve reliability of the OLSRv2 protocol. The interoperability with OLSRv2 is retained.
